name: Secure the Files Lite
description:
Tap to interact with the PC. Tap and hold to charge the generator. Tap on the pill to take medicine. Keep your anxiety levels as low as you can. Locate a file, then type the code into the PC to secure it. Secure all 20 remaining files.

There are 3 endings to collect.

Credits:

Game by me, code by me, music by Fesliyan Studios, sound effects by me and Fesliyan Studios, graphics by me.
